entry.title: War Of Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: miladystark

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,617Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 9

Summary: Lieutenant Commander Evan Buckley has survived war zones, covert missions, and enough explosions to fill a lifetime—but nothing prepared him for Staff Sergeant Eddie Diaz, the army medic with a sharp tongue and zero regard for rank.They clash, they fight, they bleed—and somewhere between they start to fall. Slowly. Stupidly. Against all odds. Because in a world where every second counts, love is the one thing they never trained for.

entry.title: Hunger for you
entry.summary:
Author: LunaDusktreader

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,402Chapters: 7/13Kudos: 8

Summary: Buck has always known that the chemistry between him and Eddie was undeniable, but he never imagined that a simple moment of care could ignite such intense and forbidden desire. When Eddie begins to deal with the unexpected effects of lactation, the discomfort quickly turns into something new – a need that awakens unfamiliar sensations.At first, it is just an innocent touch, a gesture of support. But when Buck notices the way Eddie reacts, their gazes linger, their touches become more lingering, and the tension between them becomes impossible to ignore. Between hesitant whispers and bodies seeking each other, they discover a shared pleasure that scares and excites them in equal measure.What began as a moment of vulnerability turns into an explosion of desire and connection. But are they ready to accept what this means for the relationship they have built? Between surrender and uncertainty, Buck and Eddie will discover that, sometimes, hunger goes far beyond what can be controlled.

entry.title: This Is Something New
entry.summary:
Author: White_Tape_01

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,851Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: This is something new. They don't do this. Eddie held her hand and swept her hair away from her face when the ladder truck was on top of her. Buck pulled him under the engine and picked him up when they were being shot at. But they've never done this. Buck isn't in danger. Sure, blood is pooling in her foot and she's been here longer than Eddie would ever be comfortable with, but she's okay. She can still wiggle her toes. There are paramedics on the way.

entry.title: Blue November Star
entry.summary:
Author: ash_ptv

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,053Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 76

Summary: Buck and Eddie have a falling out before Eddie moves to Texas, which means they aren't on speaking terms with each other. Buck feels horrible for how things ended and wants to apologize but isn't sure where to start so he decides he needs to spend some time in Texas to truly show he's sorry and possibly tell Eddie about some unresolved feelings. Unfortunately for Buck, he has an accident and doesn't make it to Texas. His accident causes him to lose his memory. So, Evan "Buck" Buckley no longer remembers his name or the names of his loved ones. How will this accident effect Buck in the long run? How will Eddie react learning his former best friend is hospitalized?

entry.title: Phoenix from the ashes
entry.summary:
Author: Ficalicious

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,772Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 301

Summary: All in all, Buck was feeling great about his return to the 118.He had earned his life back.Spencer had been right, the decision to take his leg had been the right one in the end he knew, he had no regrets. And the team had welcomed him back, Bobby especially despite the fact that during the first few shifts the man had looked more than a little tense, his eyes constantly straying back to Buck as if he was terrified something would go wrong and he’d get hurt again....Buck is back where he belongs. Featuring surprise visitors, and LA having a new serial killer calling himself the Phoenix.

entry.title: And somehow, I found my way back to you
entry.summary:
Author: mostly_luminous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,124Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 20

Summary: Evan Buckley hides his pain to avoid burdening others, always putting their needs first. Seen as strong and dependable, he silently struggles while earning praise for having it all together. But no one realizes the emotional cost of being the one everyone relies on—because he never shows how broken he really feels inside.And then, he just wants to stop. Maybe start something new. Somewhere far.So, he left... the 118, his sister, LA.... Eddie.And after 2 years, he still found his way to them........to him.

entry.title: This Is How It Ends (Every Time)
entry.summary:
Author: Silveraura

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,573Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 10

Summary: Buck loves him like a bruise that never fades. It sits under the surface and aches whenever he breathes too close.Eddie lives behind walls he cannot name, too afraid of what might happen if he lets the truth in and the denial out.One night, Buck speaks the words Eddie has spent years avoiding. The air does not ignite, but something shifts. Something cracks.Now they are standing in the ruins of what they never had the courage to build.They are not lovers.They are not only friends.They are something unbearable in between.

entry.title: All the Signs I Missed
entry.summary:
Author: IdoGeek

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,869Chapters: 2/12Kudos: 62

Summary: It’s not a whisper, not exactly. It’s just… matter-of-fact. Like saying it out loud isn’t the hard part. Like waiting for a reaction is.The words drop between them, sudden and small, but precise.Eddie blinks, caught mid-step.“What?”Buck searches his face. Something subtle shifts behind his eyes. “Wait… you didn’t know?”There’s no accusation in it. Just confusion. Like it never occurred to him that Eddie wouldn’t know.Eddie stares, his brain a beat behind his body. “No, I—I didn’t.” OR Buck is trans and out. So out, that most people don't think about it anymore. So when Eddie joins the 118, no one mentions it. The question is, how long will it be, until Eddie finds out? finished and will be updated daily

entry.title: We'll be a fine line (we'll be alright)
entry.summary:
Author: DylanJ10000

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 96,471Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 162

Summary: Ethan Bennett never expected a DNA test to change his life. But at fifteen, one name brought his world into focus—Maddie Buckley, a 9-1-1 dispatcher in Los Angeles, and the woman who left him at a fire station when he was six weeks old.Six years later, Ethan transfers to UCLA under the guise of a fresh start. In truth, he’s come to find the woman who gave him life, then disappeared from it. But what begins as a quiet search for answers unfolds into something much bigger: family, forgiveness, and the life he never knew he needed.

entry.title: This Line Is for Emergencies Only (But You Can Keep Calling)
entry.summary:
Author: sherlockedblogger20

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,559Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 20

Summary: Evan Buckley has never been the type to settle — not in cities, not in jobs, definitely not in relationships. But a failed night shift as a brand-new 9-1-1 dispatcher, a bad drink decision, and one very dramatic car accident later… he wakes up in the hospital with a headache, a leg cast, and one very attractive firefighter sitting at his bedside.Firefighter Eddie Diaz is used to chaotic rescues and reckless drivers. He’s not used to flirty, slightly concussed patients calling him “Firefighter of the Month” and asking if emergency responders make house calls. He’s definitely not used to guys who fake amnesia just to keep the conversation going.A romantic comedy AU where the firefighter falls for the dispatcher, memory is optional, but flirting is definitely not.
